abilities.description: Creates a massive Special Hollow ghost that can trap and grab opponents in its mouth.
Detonates hollow ghosts to create powerful explosions.
Allows user to separate their spirit from their physical body and fight remotely while the body remains safe elsewhere.

weaknesses.weakness: Physical body is vulnerable when spirit form is separated
weaknesses.description: While Perona's ghost form is invulnerable, her physical body remains defenseless and can be attacked or immobilized.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, Perona cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

trivia: The Horo Horo no Mi's astral projection ability is fully revealed in this episode, showing that Perona can separate her consciousness from her body to fight remotely.
This Devil Fruit's weakness becomes the key to Usopp's victory, as he targets her immobile physical body rather than her invulnerable ghost form.
Moria's shadow power Doppelman is shown briefly in this episode as Luffy continues to fight it.
